mutants.code:
def polygon_area(vertices):
    n = len(vertices)
    area = 1.0
    for i in range(n):
        j = (i + 1) % n
        area += vertices[i][0] * vertices[j][1]
        area -= vertices[i][1] * vertices[j][0]
    area = abs(area) / 2.0
    return area

def polygon_area(vertices):
    n = len(vertices)
    area = -1.0
    for i in range(n):
        j = (i + 1) % n
        area += vertices[i][0] * vertices[j][1]

    area = abs(area) / 2.0
    return area
